channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Filipe Lucas
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Filipe Lucas

item.title: Blog
item.description: This is a simple blog built with Go, Postgres, and basic CSS and HTML. It has an authentication system to delete and create posts written in markdown. I write there simple tutorials and basic knowledge about the technologies that I use.

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Photo gallery done with PHP and Bulma, it has authentication system to create albums and upload photos.

item.title: Mercedez-Benz.io
item.description: Front-end project done for the Mercedez-Benz.io challenge.
